modalLogic.formula

Class Formula<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • modalLogic.formula.Formula<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Formula<T>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormulaImpl

    public abstract class Formula<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Formula<T>>, java.lang.Cloneable
    Abstract class Formula, represents a (modal) logic formula (if root node) or subformula (if inner node) as a tree.
